title: Card Freeze Process
chunks: To freeze a card, verify customer identity first
Check for recent transactions before freezing
Always require OTP verification for security

title: Dispute Resolution
chunks: For unauthorized transactions, gather transaction details
Verify customer identity before opening dispute
Use reason code 10.4 for unauthorized transactions
Use reason code 10.5 for duplicate transactions

title: Travel Notice
chunks: Customers can set travel notices for international transactions
Travel notices help prevent false fraud alerts
Can be set via mobile app or customer service

title: Risk Assessment
chunks: High risk factors: velocity, device change, MCC anomaly
Medium risk: unusual location, large amount
Low risk: regular patterns, known merchants
